title: Haircut Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Nico-san, sorry to keep you waiting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>No worries. Nico just happened to arrive a little early.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>But I made you wait—<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eeek?! Y-yes!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You cut your bangs...? It looks like you trimmed off about 3 millimeters.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>...How did you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Who do you think Nico is?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>The number one idol in the universe, Yazawa Nico-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Exactly! I’m the number one idol in the universe. Of course, I’d notice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Amazing...! Even my mom didn’t notice, but you did...I’m so moved...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It’s only natural for Nico to notice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
